S06bsu052_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena arhadbhikṣusahasreṇa,
S06bsu052_u:5: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhānāṃ paripūrṇairdaśabhirbodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvairavinivartanīyairanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu052_u:11: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto 'ruṇodgatakālasamaye svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S06bsu052_u:12: upasaṃkramya vihārasya bahirdvāre sthito 'bhūttathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S06bsu052_u:13: athāyuṣmānapi śāradvatīputraḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmadbhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S06bsu052_u:19: anye ca mahāśrāvakāḥ svakasvakebhyo vihārebhyo niṣkramya yena bhagavato vihārastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:21: atha khalu bhagavānabhikrāntābhikrāntaṃ mahāśrāvakasaṃnipātaṃ viditvā svakādvihārānniṣkramya bahirdvārasyaikānte prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat /
S06bsu052_u:22: niṣadya ca bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma - kutastvaṃ śāradvatīputra kalyamevāgatya tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ?
S06bsu052_u:23: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - sarvaprathamataraṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:25_0: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - satyaṃ kila
S06bsu052_u:25_1: tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ sarvaprathamataraṃ tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitastathāgatasya darśanāya
S06bsu052_u:26: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - evametat bhagavan,
S06bsu052_u:29: upasaṃkramya ekānte sthito bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S06bsu052_u:30: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan atṛpto 'haṃ tathāgatasya darśanena vandanena paryupāsanena ca /
S06bsu052_u:31: yadapyahaṃ bhagavan tathāgatamupasaṃkramāmi darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S06bsu052_u:38: yathāhaṃ paśyāmi yathāhaṃ vande yathāhaṃ paryupāse /
S06bsu052_u:39: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca /
S06bsu052_u:40: ahaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:41: bhagavānāha - kathaṃ mañjuśrīstathāgato draṣṭavyo yāvat paryupāsitavyaḥ?
S06bsu052_u:42: mañjuśrīrāha - tathatākāreṇa tathāgataṃ paśyāmi avikalpākāreṇa anupalambhayogena,
S06bsu052_u:45: na ca tathatā samudāgacchati, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:46: na tathatā bhavati na vibhavati, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:47: na tathatā deśasthā na pradeśasthā, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:48: na tathatā atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:49: na tathatā dvayaprabhāvitā nādvayaprabhāvitā, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:50: na tathatā saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:51: na tathatā utpadyate na nirudhyate, evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:52: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca /
S06bsu052_u:53: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - evaṃ paśyaṃstvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kiṃ paśyasi?
S06bsu052_u:54: mañjuśrīrāha - evaṃ paśyannahaṃ bhagavan na kiṃcitpaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:55: evamahaṃ paśyan na kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ paśyāmi na nirodhaṃ paśyāmi //
S06bsu052_u:56: athāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - duṣkarakārakastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ,
S06bsu052_u:58: yasya ca te sarvasattvānāmantike mahāmaitrī pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu052_u:59: na ca te kācitsattvopalabdhiḥ sattvābhiniveśo vā /
S06bsu052_u:62: sarvasattvānāṃ ca te kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:64: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - evametad bhadanta śāradvatīputra yathā kathayasi /
S06bsu052_u:66: na ca me kācit sattvopalabdhirvā sattvābhiniveśo vā /
S06bsu052_u:67: nāyaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra saṃnāha evaṃ saṃnaddhaḥ - kathamahaṃ sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā kuryāṃ pūrṇatvaṃ vā?
S06bsu052_u:68: sacedbhadanta śāradvatīputra parikalpamupādāya ekaikasmin buddhakṣetre gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu052_u:69: ekaikaśca tathāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhet sarātriṃdivaṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:70: ekaikayā dharmadeśanayā yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukāsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ sattvā vinītāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:72: evamapi kṛtvā naiva sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu052_u:74: sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvād bhadanta śāradvatīputra sattvadhātorna conatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate //
S06bsu052_u:75: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yadi mañjuśrīḥ sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvāt sattvadhātornaivonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06bsu052_u:77: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - yadā tāvadbhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sattvānupalabdhiḥ,
S06bsu052_u:82: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ //
S06bsu052_u:83: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yadā tāvanmañjuśrīḥ atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ,
S06bsu052_u:85: sacenmañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiyantaḥ sattvā iti, kiṃ tasya tvaṃ vadeḥ?
S06bsu052_u:86: mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yāvanta eva buddhadharmā iti /
S06bsu052_u:87: saced bhagavan punarapi pṛcchet - kiyatpramāṇaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
S06bsu052_u:88: tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatpramāṇo buddhaviṣayaḥ [iti] //
S06bsu052_u:89: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiṃparyāpannaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
S06bsu052_u:91: mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatparyāpannānutpādācintyatā [iti] //
S06bsu052_u:92: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
S06bsu052_u:94: mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatpratiṣṭhito 'nutpādadhātuḥ tatpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti //
S06bsu052_u:95: bhagavānāha - yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
S06bsu052_u:97: mañjuśrīrāha - yasminnahaṃ bhagavan samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06bsu052_u:99: bhagavānāha - apratiṣṭhitasya te mañjuśrīḥ kā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
S06bsu052_u:100: mañjuśrīrāha - saiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhānam //
S06bsu052_u:101: bhagavānāha - yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
S06bsu052_u:102: kataratte kuśalamūlaṃ tasmin samaye upacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā?
S06bsu052_u:103: mañjuśrīrāha - na me bhagavan tasmin samaye kiṃcitkuśalamūlamupacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā /
S06bsu052_u:104: nāsau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati yasya kasyaciddharmasya upacayo vā apacayo vā bhavati /
S06bsu052_u:106: yā kasyaciddharmasya upacayāya vā apacayāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu052_u:107: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmān jahāti, nāpi buddhadharmānupādatte /
S06bsu052_u:109: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā na kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitā yaṃ dharmaṃ prajahyādupādadīta vā /
S06bsu052_u:110: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva saṃsāradoṣānupayāti na nirvāṇaguṇān /
S06bsu052_u:111: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan saṃsārameva tāvann samanupaśyāmi, kaḥ punarvādaḥ saṃsāradoṣān /
S06bsu052_u:112: nirvāṇameva tāvannopalabhe, kaḥ punarvādo nirvāṇaguṇān drakṣyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:113: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kasyaciddharmasyādānaṃ vā grahaṇaṃ vā niḥsaraṇaṃ vā /
S06bsu052_u:114: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya hānirvā vṛddhirvopalabhyate /
S06bsu052_u:115: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi bhagavan anutpādo hīyate vā vardhate vā /
S06bsu052_u:116: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 343) yaivaṃ bhagavan bhāvanā, sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā /
S06bsu052_u:117: sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati vā nirodhayati vā /
S06bsu052_u:118: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā karoti /
S06bsu052_u:119: yā bhagavan evaṃ bhāvanā, saiva prajñāpāramitābhāvanā /
S06bsu052_u:120: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitabhāvanā yā naivācintyān dharmān prārthayate na prādeśikān /
S06bsu052_u:121: api tu khalu punarbhagavan tadapi na saṃvidyate yatprārthayate,
S06bsu052_u:125: evaṃ pratyupasthitā ime dharmā agrāḥ ime dharmā hīnā iti /
S06bsu052_u:126: nāpi tān dharmānupalabhate yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmagratā vā hīnatā vā syāt /
S06bsu052_u:128: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kaṃciddharmamagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā kalpayati /
S06bsu052_u:129: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi bhagavan anutpādasya kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā, nāpi tathatāyā
S06bsu052_u:130: bhūtakoṭyāḥ, yāvat sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā /
S06bsu052_u:132: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - na punarmañjuśrīḥ agrā buddhadharmāḥ?
S06bsu052_u:134: tatkiṃ punarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ?
S06bsu052_u:136: mañjuśrīrāha - tatkiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyā agratā vā hīnatā prajñāyate?
S06bsu052_u:137: bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ, evametanmañjuśrīḥ yathā kathayasi /
S06bsu052_u:138: na punarmañjuśrīḥ anuttarā buddhadharmāḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - evametadbhagavan anuttarā buddhadharmāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:139: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan teṣvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
S06bsu052_u:141: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na buddhadharmāṇāmārādhanāya saṃvartate na pṛgjanadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartate /
S06bsu052_u:144: punaraparaṃ sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yā na kaṃciddharmaṃ cintayati na vijānīte /
S06bsu052_u:145: bhagavānāha - na tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ buddhadharmāṃścintayasi? mañjuśrīrāha - no bhagavan /
S06bsu052_u:146: cintayeyamahaṃ bhagavan buddhadharmān, sacedahaṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ pariniṣpattiṃ paśyeyam /
S06bsu052_u:147: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kasyaciddharmasya vikalpena pratyupasthitā - ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:151: tameva bhagavan dharmaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kulaputro nopalabhate,
S06bsu052_u:158: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktasya kulaputrasyaivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ kāmadhātuḥ,
S06bsu052_u:162: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi sa bhagavan na kaściddharmaḥ, yo nirodhadharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
S06bsu052_u:165: punaraparaṃ bhagavan eṣā sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyopakāraṃ vā apakāraṃ vā karoti /
S06bsu052_u:166: na hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dhātrī, na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāmācchetrī /
S06bsu052_u:167: eṣaiva sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:170: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ yastvamimamevaṃrūpaṃ gambhīraṃ dharmaṃ deśayasi /
S06bsu052_u:171: sthāpitā te mañjuśrīriyaṃ mudrā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06bsu052_u:173: aupalambhikānāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ pratibodhāya /
S06bsu052_u:174: na te mañjuśrīḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti naikabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:175: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
S06bsu052_u:176: api tu khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ atikramya te buddhasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu052_u:177: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti,
S06bsu052_u:179: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - pratibhāti me bhagavan bhūyasyā mātrayā prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:181: mañjuśrīrāha - eṣā sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya sthitimupalabhate nāsthitim /
S06bsu052_u:185: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nirālambanāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:187: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yatra buddhadharmā api nābhimukhībhavanti kutaḥ punaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:188: nāpi śrāvakadharmā abhimukhībhavanti, kaḥ punarvādaḥ pṛthagjanadharmāṇām //
S06bsu052_u:190: bhāvanāmāgamya acintyānapi buddhadharmānacintyā buddhadharmā iti na vikalpamāpadyate /
S06bsu052_u:191: seyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvadharmāvikalpāya draṣṭavyā //
S06bsu052_u:195_1: ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti
S06bsu052_u:196: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yāṃ na kaściddharmaḥ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā samanupaśyati /
S06bsu052_u:198: sā caiṣā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjananānātvaṃ karoti,
S06bsu052_u:204: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - kiyantastvayā mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatāḥ paryupāsitāḥ?
S06bsu052_u:205: mañjuśrīrāha - yāvanto bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya cittacaitasikā niruddhāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:208: mañjuśrīrāha - kaścitpunarbhagavan sa dharma upalabhyate yo na buddhadharmasaṃsthitaḥ?
S06bsu052_u:210: mañjuśrīrāha - bhagavan tava tāvadete buddhadharmā iti nāma na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06bsu052_u:213: mañjuśrīrāha - tadyadā tāvadahaṃ bhagavan na saṅgataiva, tatkiṃ bhūyo 'hamasaṅgatāmanuprāpsyāmi?
S06bsu052_u:219: bhagavānāha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi? mañjuśrīrāha - asanneṣa bhagavan kāyo na satkāyaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:222: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - niyatāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
S06bsu052_u:223: ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti saṃtrāsamāpatsyante //
S06bsu052_u:224: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - āsannībhūtāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
S06bsu052_u:227: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? eṣaiva bhagavan paramā bodhiḥ, yaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanubodhanā //
S06bsu052_u:228: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - buddhā eva te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:232_0: atha khalu nirālambā bhaginī bhagavantametadavocat - na te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
S06bsu052_u:235: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nirālambāḥ sarvadharmā asaṃvidyamānatvāt /
S06bsu052_u:237: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma - evametacchāradvatīputra, evametat /
S06bsu052_u:246: te te śāradvatīputra paramadānapatayo bhaviṣyanti mahādānapatayo viśiṣṭadānapatayaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:247: te te śāradvatīputra śīlasaṃpannā bhaviṣyanti paramaśīlavantaḥ paramaviśiṣṭaśīlaguṇapathaprāptāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:254: te te śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yāvat sarvakāravaropetena sarvajñajñānena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu052_u:257: punaraparaṃ bhagavan mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūmetadavocat - kaṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan icchasyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
S06bsu052_u:258: mañjuśrīrāha - sacedahaṃ bhagavan bodhaye saṃpratiṣṭheyam, evamahamiccheyamabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu052_u:261: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S06bsu052_u:264: mañjuśrīrāha - labdha eva bhagavan dharmaḥ syāt, yadyahamanupalambhacārī syām //
S06bsu052_u:265: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - paśyasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīrimāṃ mama śrāvakasaṃpadam?
S06bsu052_u:268: mañjuśrīrāha - tathāhaṃ bhagavan paśyāmi yathā naiva pṛthagjanāna paśyāmi,
S06bsu052_u:271: nāpi paśyāmi, nāpi naiva paśyāmi, evaṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:274: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ śrāvakayānikānevaṃ paśyasi,
S06bsu052_u:276: mañjuśrīrāha - bodhisattva iti bhadanta śāradvatīputra nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu052_u:277: bodhāya saṃprasthita iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:278: bodhāya caratīti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:279: abhisaṃbudhyata iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:281: śāradvatīputra āha - tathāgataṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ paśyasi?
S06bsu052_u:284: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - buddha iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
S06bsu052_u:285: mañjuśrīrāha - yatpunarbhadanta śāradvatīputra ucyate ātmeti, kasyaitadadhivacanam?
S06bsu052_u:288: evametadbhadanta śāradvatīputra yasyaitadadhivacanamātmeti, tasyaitadadhivacanaṃ buddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:289: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra apadādhivacanametad yadidamucyate buddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:290: na hyetadbhadanta śāradvatīputra vācābhirvijñāpayituṃ buddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:291: vāgapi bhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukarā nirūpayitum - iyaṃ vāgiti, kutaḥ punarbuddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:292: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra yadevaṃ vadasi - kasyaitadadhivacanaṃ buddha iti,
S06bsu052_u:293: yo na samudāgato notpanno na nirotsyate,
S06bsu052_u:294: yo na kenaciddharmeṇa samanvāgato nāpyatra kiṃcitpadamabhedam,
S06bsu052_u:295: apadasyaitadbhadanta śāradvatīputra adhivacanaṃ yaduta buddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:296: tathāgataṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra paryeṣitukāmena ātmā paryeṣitavyaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:298: yathā ātmā atyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06bsu052_u:300: yathā ātmā na kenaciddharmeṇa vacanīyaḥ, tathā buddho 'pi na kenaciddharmeṇa vacanīyaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:301: yatra na kācitsaṃkhyā, sa ucyate buddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:303: evametadbhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukaramājñātuṃ buddha iti yadadhivacanam //
S06bsu052_u:304: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - nāyaṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathā deśayati yathā ādikarmikā bodhisattvā ājānīyuḥ /
S06bsu052_u:305: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - nāhaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra tathā deśayāmi yathā kṛtāvino 'pyarhanta ājñāsyanti /
S06bsu052_u:318: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na bodhyā kiṃcidabhisaṃboddhavyam, nāpi bodhirbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate //
S06bsu052_u:320: mañjuśrīrāha - na bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhagavatā dharmadhāturabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:321: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra dharmadhātureva bhagavān /
S06bsu052_u:324: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra sa eva dharmadhāturbodhiḥ /
S06bsu052_u:326: abhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti bodheradhivacanametat, yo 'sau dharmadhāturiti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S06bsu052_u:329: avijñaptikamiti bhadanta śāradvatīputra naitacchakyaṃ vijñāpayituṃ saṃskṛtatvena vā yāvad asaṃskṛtatvena vā /
S06bsu052_u:332: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādurbhāvo nāsti yasmin sthitvā vijñapyeran /
S06bsu052_u:337: naiva te svargagāminaḥ, na apāyagāminaḥ, na parinirvāṇagāminaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:341: ye 'pi bhadanta śāradvatīputra catasṛṣu mūlāpattiṣvavasthitāḥ, amūle te 'vasthitāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:342: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra anutpādasya mūlaṃ vā agraṃ vā iṣyate /
S06bsu052_u:345: adhikasamārope bhadanta sāradvatīputra caran loke dakṣiṇīyo bhavati /
S06bsu052_u:347: śrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:348: aśrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:349: kalpito bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:350: akalpiko bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:352: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi?
S06bsu052_u:353: mañjuśrīrāha - na samatā samupahatā, yā samatā saiva sā netrī /
S06bsu052_u:354: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - asamupahatanetrīko bhikṣurarhan kṣīṇāsrava ityucyate /
S06bsu052_u:356: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi?
S06bsu052_u:357: mañjuśrīrāha - aṇūnyapi tasya bhayāni na saṃvidyante /
S06bsu052_u:359: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - anuttīrṇabhaya iti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanamiti //
S06bsu052_u:360: śāradvatīputra āha - anutpannakṣāntika iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
S06bsu052_u:361: mañjuśrīrāha - yena bhadanta śāradvatīputra aṇurapi dharmo notpāditaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:363: śāradvatīputra āha - avinīto bhikṣuriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
S06bsu052_u:364: mañjuśrīrāha - avinīto bhikṣuriti bhadanta śāradvatīputra arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam /
S06bsu052_u:365: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? avinayo hi vinītaḥ, na vinayo vinītaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:366: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - avinīto bhikṣuriti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam //
S06bsu052_u:367: śāradvatīputra āha - adhicitte caratīti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
S06bsu052_u:368: mañjuśrīrāha - adhicitte caratīti bhadanta śāradvatīputra pṛthagjanasyaitadadhivacanam /
S06bsu052_u:369: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi?
S06bsu052_u:370: mañjuśrīrāha - tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra so 'dhikaroti //
S06bsu052_u:371: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S06bsu052_u:376: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra kṣīṇā me āsravāḥ ḥrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā /
S06bsu052_u:377: anena bhadanta ḥāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa kṣīṇāsravo na cārhan //
S06bsu052_u:379: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - syānmañjuśrīḥ paryāyo yadbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'bhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
S06bsu052_u:380: mañjuśrīrāhasyādbhagavan paryāyaḥ yabdodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaḥ abhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu052_u:381: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhāvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
S06bsu052_u:389: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa abhavyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum //
S06bsu052_u:390: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - bodhiriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
S06bsu052_u:392: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bodhiprakṛtikānyeva tāni pañcānantaryāṇi abhāvatvāt /
S06bsu052_u:397: te na kenacidabhisaṃbuddhāḥ, na dṛṣṭāḥ, na jñātāḥ, yāvat na viditāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:399: api tu khalu punarbhagavan abhimānikaiḥ sthāpitānyetāni abhisaṃbudhāni(ddhā? )
S06bsu052_u:401: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - kiṃ te mañjuśrīḥ mamāntike evaṃ bhavati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti?
S06bsu052_u:403: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na me bhagavan evaṃ bhavet - tathāgato me tathāgata iti /
S06bsu052_u:404: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? [tathā caiva tathatā ca] yathā ca tathātā, tathā caiṣa tathāgataḥ /
S06bsu052_u:405: tathā hi bhagavan na tathatā tathāgataṃ vijñapayati, nāpi tathāgatastathatāṃ vijñapayati /
S06bsu052_u:406: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan paramārthato 'bhāvā tathatā /
S06bsu052_u:408: tasmāttarhi bhagavan na me evaṃ bhavati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti /
S06bsu052_u:409: api tu tathāgata iti bhagavan nāmadheyamātrametat /
S06bsu052_u:410: tat kataro 'sau tathāgato yatra me evaṃ bhaviṣyati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti?
S06bsu052_u:412: saṃśayaste mañjuśrīstathāgate? mañjuśrīrāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu052_u:416: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - na tava mañjuśrīrevaṃ bhavati - utpannastathāgata iti?
S06bsu052_u:417: mañjuśrīrāha - syānme bhagavan utpannastathāgata iti, saceddharmadhātorutpattiḥ syāt //
S06bsu052_u:418: bhagavānāha - nādhimucyase tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtā iti?
S06bsu052_u:419: mañjuśrīrāha - kaścit punarbhagavan ekaviṣayā buddha bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ?
S06bsu052_u:421: bhagavānāha - evametanmañjuśrīḥ, ekaviṣayā buddhā bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:422: mañjuśrīrāha - kaścitpunarbhagavan etarhi tiṣṭhati? bhagavānāha - evametanmañjuśrīḥ /
S06bsu052_u:423: mañjuśrīrāha - tena hi bhagavan ete gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto na parinirvṛtāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:424: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan ekaviṣayā buddhā bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:425: na ca acintyatā utpadyate nirudhyate vā /
S06bsu052_u:427: ye 'pi te anāgate 'dhvani tathagatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti, abhisaṃbuddhā eva te /
S06bsu052_u:428: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi acintyatā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
S06bsu052_u:430: prapañcayanti te bhagavan lokasaṃniveśaṃ yeṣāmevaṃ bhavati - utpannastathāgato yāvat parinirvāsyati veti //
S06bsu052_u:431: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - tena hi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ idaṃ tathāgatācintyam,
S06bsu052_u:432: acintyaṃ niścintyaṃ tathāgatasya vā agrata udāhārairudāhareḥ,
S06bsu052_u:433: avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vā arhato vā kṣīṇāsravasya /
S06bsu052_u:434: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi te śrutvā naivānujñāsyanti, naiva pratikrokṣyanti /
S06bsu052_u:436: mañjuśrīrāha - acintyānāṃ niścintyānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ ko 'trānujñāsyati vā pratikrokṣyati vā?
S06bsu052_u:437: bhagavānāha - yathaiva mañjuśrīḥ tathāgato niścintyaḥ, tathaiva pṛthagjanā api niścintyāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:438: mañjuśrīrāha - pṛthagjanā api bhagavan tathaiva niścintyāḥ? bhagavānāha - evametanmañjuśrīḥ /
S06bsu052_u:444: ye kecidbhagavan parinirvāṇāya prasthitāḥ, vihariṣyante te bhagavan /
S06bsu052_u:450: tataḥ paścājjñāsyatha - ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ ime āryadharmā iti //
S06bsu052_u:451: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - icchasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ tathāgataṃ sarvasattvānāmagryam?
S06bsu052_u:457: bhagavānāha - icchasi punastvaṃ mañjuśrīrevam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti?
S06bsu052_u:458: mañjuśrīrāha - iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan evam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti,
S06bsu052_u:461: na bhagavan buddhotpādaḥ kaśyacidupakāreṇa vā apakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:462: taktasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi sthita eṣa dhātuḥ, asaṃkīrṇa eṣa dhātuḥ, yaduta acintyadhātuḥ /
S06bsu052_u:463: tasmiśca dhātau na śrāvakanānātvam, yāvat na pṛthagjananānātvamupalabhyate //
S06bsu052_u:464: bhagavānāha - na tvaṃ mañjuśrīrevamicchasi - anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ tathāgata iti?
S06bsu052_u:465: mañjuśrīrāha - abhāvatvābhdagavan puṇyakṣetraṃ tathagataḥ, tenaitadanuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetram /
S06bsu052_u:467: api tu khalu punarbhagavan nātra kaściddharmaḥ samudāgacchati na kṣīyate /
S06bsu052_u:469: tatra ca bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate /
S06bsu052_u:470: bhagavānāha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi - tatra kṣetre bījamavaropitaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate iti?
S06bsu052_u:471: mañjuśrīrāha - tathā hi bhagavan acintyaṃ tatkṣetram, evaṃ tatpuṇyakṣetram //
S06bsu052_u:472: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ buddhānubhāvena ṣaḍvikāraṃ mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt,
S06bsu052_u:474: saptānāṃ bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ trayāṇāṃ copāsakaśatānāṃ catvāriṃśataścopāsikāsahasrāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭeśca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devakoṭīniyutaśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam //
S06bsu052_u:475: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsacīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumāṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
S06bsu052_u:476: kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya?
S06bsu052_u:477: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmāntamānandametadavocat - ayamānanda puṇyakṣetranirdeśo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ pūrvakairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:478: ayamānanda hetuḥ, ayaṃ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya //
